related_questions.question:
There is a new mature tourism park in my town called Panorama Kedah Tempunak. The park is located in Tempunak    Kapuas village. It only takes thirty minutes from my house by motorcycle to go there. It is a very big park, with colorful
flowers everywhere. There are also many fruit plants, such as papayas, rambutans, rose apples, and dragon fruits. In
the middle of the park, there is a big lake. ive can explore the lake by using small duck-like boats. Next to the lake, there
is a grassy landscape that makes the park looks green and fertile. The park has some outdoor benches and hammocks
where we can sit and enjoy the view while eating snacks and drink. The park is really worth a visit.
36. What can we find in Panorama Kedah Tempunak?
A indoor benches
B. small river
C. friendly villagers
D. grassy landscape
37. How long does it take to go there from the writer house?
A. 20 minutes
B. 25 minutes
C.30 minutes
D. 35 minutes
38 Which statement is NOT TRUE about the park based on the text above?
A. There is a big lake in the middle of the park
C. there are lion-shape boats in the lake.
B. There are many fruit plants in the park
D. the park is located in Tempunak​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

nyimak iya iya iya iya iya iya iya iya iya iya iya iya iya iya iya iya iya iya iya iya iya iya iya iya iya iya iya

Jawaban:

1. B

2. C

3. C

4. C

5. D

6. A

7. B

related_questions.question:
There____some cute cats on the sofa a. Am b. is c. are d. does
secepatnya ya​

answers.answer:
there are some cute cats on the sofa

Penjelasan:

c) are

====================================

C. Are

Pembahasan

Untuk benda yang hanya ada 1 atau tunggal kita menggunakan "There is" , Sedangkan benda yang lebih dari 1 atau jamak maka kita menggunakan "There are".

Maka di pertanyaan tersebut kita menggunakan "There are". Karena ada beberapa hewan atau pada teks tersebut dijelaskan "some cute cats on the sofa" yang artinya beberapa kucing lucu di sofa.

====================================

related_questions.question: Bu Sri meminjam uang dikoperasi sebesar Rp.6.000.000 dengan bunga 18% setahun jika lamah meminjam 12 bulan .maka berapakah total pinjaman yang harus bu sri bayar kepada koperasi ?pakai jalan y plis ​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

bunga selama setahun atau 12 bulan =

18 x Rp. 6.000.000 = Rp. 1.080.000

pinjaman + bunga = Rp. 6.000.000 + Rp. 1.080.000 = Rp. 7.080.000

Total pinjaman yang harus di bayar ibu Sri adalah Rp. 7.080.000

Penjelasan:

bunga selama setahun atau 12 bulan =

18 x Rp. 6.000.000 = Rp. 1.080.000

pinjaman + bunga = Rp. 6.000.000 + Rp. 1.080.000 = Rp. 7.080.000

Total pinjaman yang harus di bayar ibu Sri adalah Rp. 7.080.000

semoga membantu^•^

related_questions.question:
6.) ....... Mary reading a book in her classroom at this moment?    a. Is
b. am
c. was
d. Were

7 Susan and Susanna ......... writing poems for an English cubiect now
a. is 
b. Are 
c. Am
d. Be

Pliss bantu Lagi Kakak Besok ujian saya harus di kumpul​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

6.) ....... Mary reading a book in her classroom at this moment?

a. Is

b. am

c. was

d. Were

7 Susan and Susanna ......... writing poems for an English cubiect now

a. is

b. Are

c. Am

d. Be

Penjelasan:

Jawaban dicetak tebal dan menggunakan bentuk Present Continuous Tense. Nomor 6. karena subjeknya Mary, maka Tobe nya adalah a. is.

Nomor 7. karena subjeknya Susan dan Susanna, maka Tobe nya adalah b. are.

Semoga membantu ya.
